verses.text: O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: because his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
Let \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* now \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, that his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
Let the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* now \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, that his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
Let them now that \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, that his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

I \w called|strong="H7121"\w* upon the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d* in \w distress|strong="H4712"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* me, \add and set me\add* in a large \w place|strong="H4800"\w*.  +  r 118.5  t in distress: Heb. out of distress *

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* on my side; I will not \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*: what \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto me?\f + \fr 118.6 \ft on…: Heb. for me\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* taketh my part with them that \w help|strong="H5826"\w* me: therefore shall I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add my desire\add* upon them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me.
\add It is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* than to put \w confidence|strong="H0982"\w* in \w man|strong="H0120"\w*.
\add It is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* than to put \w confidence|strong="H0982"\w* in \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*.

All \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* compassed me \w about|strong="H5437"\w*: but in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will I \w destroy|strong="H4135"\w* them.\f + \fr 118.10 \ft destroy…: Heb. cut them off\f*

They compassed me \w about|strong="H5437"\w*; yea, they compassed me \w about|strong="H5437"\w*: but in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* I will \w destroy|strong="H4135"\w* them.

They compassed me \w about|strong="H5437"\w* like \w bees|strong="H1682"\w*; they are \w quenched|strong="H1846"\w* as the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* of \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w*: for in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* I will \w destroy|strong="H4135"\w* them.\f + \fr 118.12 \ft destroy: Heb. cut down\f*
Thou hast \w thrust|strong="H1760"\w* \w sore|strong="H1760"\w* at me that I might \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* me.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* and \w song|strong="H2176"\w*, and is become my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

The \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w rejoicing|strong="H7440"\w* and \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \add is\add* in the \w tabernacles|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*: the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w valiantly|strong="H2428"\w*.

The right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* is \w exalted|strong="H7426"\w*: the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w valiantly|strong="H2428"\w*.
I shall not \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, but \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*.
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd* hath \w chastened|strong="H3256"\w* me \w sore|strong="H3256"\w*: but he hath not given me \w over|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

\w Open|strong="H6605"\w* to me the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: I will \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into them, \add and\add* I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*:
This \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, into which the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w*.
I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee: for thou hast \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* me, and art become my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

The \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* \add which\add* the \w builders|strong="H1129"\w* \w refused|strong="H3988"\w* is become the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \add stone\add* of the \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*.

This is the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* doing; it \add is\add* \w marvellous|strong="H6381"\w* in our \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 118.23 \ft the \+nd LORD’s\+nd*…: Heb. from the \+nd LORD\+nd*\f*

This \add is\add* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add which\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w*; we will \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* in it.

\w Save|strong="H3467"\w* now, I \w beseech|strong="H0577"\w* thee, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, I \w beseech|strong="H0577"\w* thee, send now \w prosperity|strong="H6743"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* he that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: we have \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* you out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which hath shewed us \w light|strong="H0215"\w*: \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="H2282"\w* with \w cords|strong="H5688"\w*, \add even\add* unto the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.
Thou \add art\add* my \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee: \add thou art\add* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I will \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* thee.

O give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
